message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.NE 

The paper discusses the application of Virtual Adversarial Training (VAT) on Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs) for node classification, which falls under the category of machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also involves the use of adversarial regularization, which is a common technique in the field of artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper perturbs virtual adversarial perturbations on features, which is a common technique in computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper involves the improvement of generalization performance, which is a common topic in neural networks (cs.NE).
